translations.WEBSERVER_INVALID_CERT: Invalid SSL certificate or key. Check your `http2cert` directory.
translations.INDEX_ERR_UNCAUGHT_EXCEPTION: > Uncaught exception. Usually this could happen in abnormal unpredictable conditions.
translations.INDEX_ERR_UNHANDLED_REJECTION: > Unhandled rejection. Usually this might cause a critical error so it needs to be cheked by its developer.
translations.CONFIGURE_INVALID_CONFIG_FILE2: > This config file will be ignored.
translations.WORKER_NO_ASSETS_DIR: There is something wrong in {{dir:shortPath}}, It will be ignored.
translations.MESSENGER_NO_CALLSIGN: Messenger needs a callsign to identify
translations.MESSENGER_NO_HANDLER: There is no handler for the callsign '{{callsign}}'
translations.MESSENGER_REPLY_TIMEOUT: Too long waiting for getting a reply from '{{callsign}}'
